channel.title: Mutli paths help
channel.description:
it seems i have needed alot of help latly an thanks you to all who have help me hopefully this will be the last time i need help (probly not thou lol)
ok well on to my problem in my script which i attached below i run it an i get the error
[Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 0065154B in module 'scar.exe'. Read of address 00000000 in line 503 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Text.scar
can someone please help me figure out what this means thanks

item.title: Mutli paths help
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Hmm, sometimes you get weird errors like that when you forget to set the cross-hairs. Recently, Jagex made it so you will lose the Client handle after selecting colors, etc… So, make sure you set the Crosshairs on Runescape twice right before hitting play.

Also, you don’t need to repeat Setup; or DeclarePlayers; and stuff in your main loop, thats just a waste of memory. Try this:

[hr]
[php]begin
setup;
DeclarePlayers;
login1;
loadbtms;
loaddtm;
repeat
antirandoms;
findbank1;
WalkToFlax;
pickflax;
tospiningwheel;
door;
upladder;
spin;
downladder;
tobank;
bankbstrings;
progressreport;
loop;
Login1;
until
(tripsdone=amounttrips);
logout;
end.
[/php]
[hr]

If what I said doesn’t help, I will look into the problem deeper, but it should be fine.

Read full topic
